Key Match Events: Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan stitched a stand of 139 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam mentions the Irish batters were batting brilliantly in the first half but his bowlers put pressure by taking few wickets
Lorcan Tucker shares the platform was set for a big score but unfortunately it didn't come off
Shaheen Afridi tells it is important to get the team ready before the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series started with an unexpected win for the home team but the favourites, Pakistan unsurprisingly won the final two games to win the series comfortably
Others: The Irish bowlers tried their best but they never looked like could turn the tides in their favour
In over# 17 6 6 1wd 0 1 0W 0 Mark Adair bowls the final over for Ireland
Pakistan doesn't want to waste any time and scores 12 runs needed to win the series in over# 16
